# contents

**Instance Property**

The main content of the note.

## Declaration

```swift
var contents: [INNoteContent] { get }
```

## Discussion

A note may contain any number of [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INNoteContent] objects with the note’s text and images.

## Getting the Note Content

- **title**: The title text for the note.

items.description: The title text for the note.
